Message: How was my performance? Please, be sincere.

Your delivery showed passion and emotion, which are essential for any captivating performance. However, I noticed a few areas where refinement could enhance your piece. Pitch consistency seemed slightly off in parts, and your breath control might benefit from more practice. Remember, these are growth opportunities, so keep striving to improve
A friend of mine, told me, my performance was very bad. What do you think about it?

Every individual perceives art differently, and while your performance may not have resonated with one person, my analysis suggests potential for growth. Focusing on self-improvement and honing your skills will ultimately shape a more fulfilling artistic journey.
Dont you think, I should attend singing course, to improve my skills?

Attending a singing course can certainly provide structured guidance, technique development, and valuable feedback from instructors. It's an excellent way to invest in your craft and progress as an artist.
